text: Nadiah was really helpful in guiding me through the courses at Yamaha. She took the time to listen to my needs and gave me clear, thoughtful advice. She also briefly recommended a digital piano that’s perfect for beginners like me. Great service and a pleasant experience overall!

Counter staff are very helpful and cheerful.  I see them every sat morning, they always greet us with a hello or tell my children to enjoy our music lessons.  Even the teachers smile to us though we are not taking lessons with them.  Keep up the great spirit Yamaha Hougang.
Came here for training. Great trainer.

I’ve called their number thrice on different days during their office hours but no one ever picks up. They also don’t respond on their WhatsApp when I want to book tuning service appointment. Pls work on your customer service cause it’s honestly rubbish.
Awesome school. Nadiah the lady boss is very kind.
